Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/92nd
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temp rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 92nd, Houston, 87th and Commercial, near Commercial/92nd

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 92nd, Houston, 87th and Commercial then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Commercial/92nd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express & #28 Stony Island Temporary Reroute near 75th/South Shore Drive
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express ,28 Stony Island 71 71st/South Shore  buses are temp rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 75th/South Shore Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express , #28 Stony Island and # 71 71st/South Shore  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 75th/South Shore Drive.

#6 Jackson Park Express buses will operate via South Shore, 75th, Coles, and 79th to terminal.

#28 Stony Island buses will operate via South Shore, 75th, Coles, 79th and South Shore.

 #71 71st/South Shore  buses will operate via 75th, Coles, 79th and South Shore.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kilpatrick
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner & Division, due to street blockage near Division/Kilpatrick

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Division, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Division/Kilpatrick. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 87th
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 87th due to a signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at 87th due to a signal problems.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

# 29 State

#67 67th/69th/71st

 #79 79th

#87 87th

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
